en.legal.privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
en.legal.privacy_policy.sections.informa: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and learning preferences. We also collect usage data to improve our services.
en.legal.privacy_policy.sections.use_of_: Your data is used to provide personalized learning experiences, track your progress, and improve our AI algorithms. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
en.legal.privacy_policy.sections.data_st: Your data is stored securely on our servers using industry-standard encryption. You can request deletion of your data at any time.
en.legal.privacy_policy.sections.data_pr: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
en.legal.privacy_policy.sections.our_rig: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of any changes.
en.legal.terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
en.legal.terms_of_service.sections.accep: By using this app, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.
en.legal.terms_of_service.sections.user_: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities under your account.
en.legal.terms_of_service.sections.intel: All content and materials in this app are owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws.
en.legal.terms_of_service.sections.limit: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this app.
en.legal.terms_of_service.sections.termi: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our sole discretion, without notice.
en.legal.terms_of_service.sections.subsc: Subscriptions are billed through the app store and can be cancelled at any time.

legal.privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
legal.privacy_policy.sections.informatio: We collect information you provide directly, such as your name, email address, and learning preferences. We also collect usage data to improve our services.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.use_of_dat: Your data is used to provide personalized learning experiences, track your progress, and improve our AI algorithms. We do not sell your personal information to third parties.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.data_stora: Your data is stored securely on our servers using industry-standard encryption. You can request deletion of your data at any time.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.data_prote: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
legal.privacy_policy.sections.our_rights: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of any changes.
legal.terms_of_service.title: Terms of Service
legal.terms_of_service.sections.acceptan: By using this app, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.user_res: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and for all activities under your account.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.intellec: All content and materials in this app are owned by us and protected by intellectual property laws.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.limitati: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use this app.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.terminat: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at our sole discretion, without notice.
legal.terms_of_service.sections.subscrip: Subscriptions are billed through the app store and can be cancelled at any time.
